<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vantage Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3263) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 139</row>

**Archetype** [Sniping Duo](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=121)

**Prerequisites**
[Sniping Duo Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3258)

</column>

---

You and your spotter take advantage of each other's attacks to momentarily hide and throw your foes off-balance against your follow-up attack. When you successfully make a ranged Strike against a foe, your spotter can use a reaction to attempt a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check against the foe's Perception DC. On a success, the foe is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the spotter's next attack before the end of your spotter's next turn. Similarly, when your spotter successfully makes a ranged Strike against a foe, you can use a reaction to attempt a Stealth check against the foe's Perception DC. On a success, the foe is flat-footed against your next attack against them before the end of your next turn.
name: Vantage Shot
